channel.title: Ldapmodify on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Ldapmodify on TLDRBins

item.title: LDAP
item.description: Enum ldapsearch ldapdomaindump nmap # Get domain base ldapsearch -x -H ldap://<TARGET> -s base namingcontexts # Get all from domain ldapsearch -x -H ldap://<TARGET> -b 'DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' # Just get a class (e.g. person) ldapsearch -x -H ldap://<TARGET> -b 'DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' '(objectClass=person)' # With creds ldapsearch -x -H ldap://<TARGET> -D "CN=<USER>,CN=Users,DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>" -w '<PASSWORD>' -b 'DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' # Fix 'BindSimple: Transport encryption required.' LDAPTLS_REQCERT=never ldapsearch -x -H ldaps://<TARGET> -D "CN=<USER>,CN=Users,DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>" -w '<PASSWORD>' -b 'DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' # With creds ldapdomaindump -u '<DOMAIN>\<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' <TARGET> -o .
